application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to condition 11 (Widening of Pedestrian access from the site to shoot up hill), of Deemed (Reg4 Councils Other Development) application reference 21/2473 dated 25/04/2022 for Demolition of 1-11 Watling Gardens, 1-30 Claire Court and the associated podium car parking and substation and redevelopment to provide 125 flats: 80 for general needs (Use Class: C3) and 45 for extra care (Use Class: C3(b)) in three separate buildings ranging from 3 to 14 storeys, alongside access improvements, car parking, cycle parking, refuse and recycling storage, amenity space, landscaping and other associated works. Garages & 1-30 Claire Court, Shoot Up Hill and 1-135 Watling Gardens, London, NW2
site_name: Garages & 1-30 Claire Court, Shoot Up Hill and 1-135 Watling Gardens, London, NW2
